objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Romance lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using expert register
Students create original romance themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Romance story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using expert register in romance context
Character B: Responding in expert register within romance theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with heart
shopping and consumer behavior with passion
shopping and consumer behavior with affection

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
